description: I've tried Pinta, Krita, MyPaint and a bunch of others before trying KolourPaint and this is by far the simplest to make little adjustments to pictures (in my case, usually screenshots)
I don't have a need for full-on graphic editors like Krita and Gimp. This great little program is fine for little edits of image files like adding circles, ellipsis or arrows to screenshots, etc.
summary: Simple paint program for quick editing

description:
I have search for many apps for Ubuntu for drawing. But atlast I found this app, which is much better than any app. This app UI is much better and it has lots of options which makes working much better. One thing, when I draw a diagram it helps me a lot.
Thanks to developers who make this wonderful software.
summary: best app for Ubuntu and Debian based distributions

description: If you had any time with MS paint, this will be familiar to you. Works like you want it to. Great place to start before you get into needing layers.
If you're looking for an MS Paint alternative, look no further than Kolourpaint.
Perfect for simple photo edits.
I found it very useful practical for frequent operations like copy, paste and crop
Just what i needed a simple paint program

Been using this program since the early 2010's - it's great for adding transparency, cropping, and more advanced things that MS Paint otherwise doesn't have (e.g contrast, saturation changes, color similarity)

It's probably the most features you can squeeze for an app that's between MSPaint & gimp. I haven't felt the need to move over to gimp - feel like I should somtime, but this app has been very great to suit most needs
summary: I'm happy this is still around

description: Its Is A good painting app
Great app for small editing add adjusts
Great simple painting app
Muy buena app para simples retoques
This is perfect for who just needs simple image edition tools, like MS Paint did in windows. Absolutely love it
If you are looking for a simple tool then use this. As many other comments it provides similar features as the MS Paint
Good simple app

None of the current Paint programs are comfortable to work with. The MS Paint program was as simple as it got. This paint program is very much like the MS Paint prog and it is so easy to use. You will enjoy the control and tools, the simplicity and how well it creates your images.
10 thumbs UP.
summary: Where have you been, I've searched everywhere for this Paint Program

description: Simple & works great. Looks & functions just like paint from XP.
summary: Simply the best MS Paint alternative out there.

description: Best Microsoft Paint Alternative. I'm feeling nostalgic!
For non-artists/designers that only need a simple software without vectors, layers, filters and stuff you won't use for simple sketches .
summary: It should come by default with Ubuntu

description:
Can't paste on it, or from it.
Tools are complicated to use.
Cannot save or export.
Definitely not for me.
I've come to rely on mspaint for quick edits like cropping screenshot and use it almost daily. Great to have a similar tool for Linux that lets me keep the same workflow.
summary: Great tool and one less reason to use Windows

description: Just like a opensource clone of legacy MS Painting, easy to use on simple icon design
The best I have been test
small but useful, is not Gimp like, but does the job pretty well
If you are looking for a simple and easy to use paint tool, this is it...
Good replacement for fans of Paint. Has similar interface to the older version of MS Paint from Windows XP.
summary: Simple editor that feels like MS Paint

description: Very useful for basic cropping or highlighting of captured images from Spectacle. Also has a nice "Make Confidential" feature that blurs out a selected area of the image.
very friendly interface. and recommended for simple and fast modifications.
summary: Recommended for Simple and fast application

description: KolourPaint won't install and I try what it ask me but did nothing! Please fix!
Beautifully simple.

My absolute favourite MS Paint alternative on Linux.
Does everything Paint does with some extra features. Love it!
Excellent and Quick App

description: ms paint best for linux
Draw rectangle, line, and other basic features - and all are working in a simple and intuitive manner.
Basically MSPaint :P
worst thing ever i seen
Great replacement of ms paint.
Great app for everyday usage
I love drawing 95's same very cool fun. I skill draw krita 100%
I love the simplicity of it. It is quick, smooth and works just as MS paint.

Solid app. 4 stars because this is the snap package, which for some reason doesn't work the first time you run it. Had to kill the process and then try again. 

Unrelated, but the flatpak version doesn't let you copy paste if you're using wayland. It also uses its own dark theme regardless of your current theme. Don't install the flatpak.

it's got everything,you gonna need

I like this program for simpler graphics projects. Many times I am not trying to make a graphical masterpiece but rather a a simple graphic to augment a sign or advertisement.

Very nice work.. Thanks..

great great great

description: Small and effective

I was searching alternative of MS Paint. I've tried some software. But they all are junk.
Finally I've got this. That's the best Software alternative MS Paint

description: Exact alternative to MS paint and works good
summary: exact alternative to MS paint and works good

description: This reminds me of what MS paint was in 1998.
Cannot open files from any folder on my Ubuntu

It looks good and easy to edit picture.
I looks like "Paint" (in Windows). It's a great software to make a quick sketch or to make simple editions in images. I recommend it!
It is useful app. like it.

This is a simple, fast, easy to use basic drawing program & image editor. When GIMP is overkill, try this. I've used kolourpaint for years across many different versions of Linux. It is rock-stable & works like a charm every time.
Simply good enough
Sometimes you just need a tool that allows you to do simple edits without any hassle. Fast and powerful enough. Love it!
Its a good alternative to MS paint if you are here for some simple image edits and drawing. Personally I have no use for image editing tools like photoshop. So this works great for me
Easy to use. I don't needed very complicated tool.
The best to do old-school edits
Very useful! Thank u so much
it's a great app.simple to use.

description: best alternative for MS paint , after working on this no looking further

It is next the most demand program after text editor and calculator.

Easy to use, just what you need when you don't need a sledge hammer to crack a nut. Well done devs
It is very usefull

MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM
A simple and fast graphic editor! Excelent!

description: has transparency and vector stuff built in which is great fun
The app wont find saved jpeg files , wont open from a clip board or save files in any format. of no use whatsoever . why is a non functioning program getting five star reviews?
Moved from Windows to Ubuntu and found this alternative to Paint. This has additional features when compared to Paint.
I have used it on Kubuntu 18.04 and 20.10. I mosstly need it to take a screenshot, crop a picture. This should come by default just like MS-Paint comes as the default little paint program on Windows.

On KDE performs flawlessly. A 10 for it.

But on gnome it doesn't open files, don't paste from clipboard either. Tried it on xubuntu 18.04,20.04 and performs poorly. Also in ubuntu 20.04 with unity.
summary: Performs poorly on Gnome but is the best choice for MSpaint

description: Einfach gehalten, leicht zu bedienen. Ok.

Du kannst die Größe der Leinwand mit Mausklick schnell und leicht verändern! - Du kannst mit einem Klick dir ein Schreibfenster erstellen! - Auch gebogene Pfeile kannst du kannst leicht kreieren! - Uswuswusw.! - Stellt Gimp deutlich in den Schatten!

description: Nada que envidiarle al ms paint!!!

Si entro en "Configuración/Aplicaciones", aprecen los dos iconos mencionados como si se tratara de dos aplicaciones distintas, aunque tienen idéntica configuración.

A algunos les parece "básicamente un Paint", y que tiene que mejorar un poco gráficamente, pero la verdad es que tiene más opciones que Paint (la versión anterior a la 3D), manteniendo su facilidad de uso... Y lo mismo que el Paint de Windows, te permite escanear a esta aplicación, directamente... Para mí, es tan buena como el Paint (eso si no es mejor) y fácil de usar, un ejemplo de que si Linux hace bien las cosas, Windows solo será un mal recuerdo...

description: cejndkjvekjvksjbevkjskejvbksjbvkjsbev

Buiscaba una alternativa en Linux al Paint.net de Windows y este programa lo es en gran medida, está francamente bien. El "Pinta" que es más parecido, está lleno de errores, Kolour Paint es mejor opción.
una app que es una alternativa un poquito mas avanzada a paint
Si creciste usando MS Paint, te sentiras en casa.

De todas las alternativas similares a Paint (window) Kolourpaint me encanta, ya que hay cosas que solo puedo usar en este editor, y me facilita la existencia, de todos los años que la uso, esta app es indispensable.
para quienes queremos algo similar al paint y incluso mejor
Muy bueno, práctico y de uso sencillo, tiene múltiples herramientas para aplicar, también permite guardar en varios formatos de imagen.

description: No se cual es el problema, no abre.

El concepto muy similar al de paint de windows, es simple y fácil de comprender, sin embargo tiene un error, probable mente lo instalaste y no inicio, tienes que esperar a que te salga la notificación de (kolour paint ha sido instalado), o esperar a que este inicie, lo recomiendo para hacer mapas conceptuales y diagramas.

Es fácil de utilizar, semejante a mspaint de Windows, incluso mas completa ... permite arrastar para abrir imagen!es! ... Y además es ESTABLE, cosa que no passa con xpaint, ni con pinta. Mejor que gpaint
summary: Incluso mas completa que msrpaint de windows, ESTABLE

Très difficile de repasser au légendaire Paint sous Windows après avoir goûté à KolourPaint. Utilisation simple et facile pour relativement beaucoup de fonctionnalités.
enregistrement impossible
Largement supérieur à son équivalent M$
Paint de window n'existera plus après la prochaine mise à jour. Il est remplacé par autre chose encore plus compliqué.
Programme très léger et rapide. Parfait pour les retouches rapides. Rien à reprocher après des années d'utilisation.
Bon logiciel facile à utiliser et pratique. Dommage qu'il n'y ait pas d'outil "flèche" (ou bien je ne l'ai pas trouvé)
Vraiment bien a essayer au minimum.
summary: très bien pour aborder le dao

description: Parfait pour remplacer MS paint. Je l'utilise toutes les semaines.

Le logiciel kolourprint semble en effet tres interessant...
cependant, l'ayant installé a partie de snapstore le 29 juillet 2020 sur ubuntu 20..4 LTS, j'ai à subir une installation problematique apapapremment : le logiciel n a accepté de fonctionner qu une fois, et il ne se lance plus, la desinstallation est impossible expliquant ''install snap change in progress''...
Il est possible que ce soit dû a autre chose que le produit lui-me et a des personnes mal-attentionnées qui me pourrissent la vie en toute impunité (toutes connections aussi , avec dégâts depuis octobre 2019) , malgré avoir averti des services censés agir pour nous en proteger ...comme d'habitude : ils ne servent plus d ailleurs qu à nous taper sur la gueule pour des corrompus qui les gavent avec notre fric en ce seul dessein !

C'est dommage pour Kolourpaint et pour moi....

Aucun problème particulier. Fonctionne correctement.
Ressemble très fortement au petit logiciel PAINT sous windows. On y retrouve toutes les fonctionnalités, et un peu plus...
Great tool for people like me who only need to do basic stuf (like crop, resize, turn left, and add some text or arrows)
I abandoned modifications of a simple ID photo because it was just not possible to save it. I won't get an MBA to use this so-called program
Les options de sauvegardes sont insuffisantes. Retrouver son fichier tient du jeu de piste. Le reste est bien, pour qui cherche de la simplicité et une prise en main immédiate.
Super application, remplace tout à fait paint de windows.
vraiment cool
Je suis en train d'attendre que sa ce télécharge et sa ma lère super.dsl pour les fautes d'orthographe.
